author: Hannah Jiang, Katie Nixdorf and Kaitlyn Wang
title: College students from low-income families are learning the hidden costs of moving back home
description: Harvard became one of the first universities to close campus to curb the spread of the coronavirus in March. For students from low-income families, having to return home comes with many hidden costs. Students Malia Marks and Alex White told Business Insider W…
content:
The journey home has been expensive for low-income students like Harvard freshman Alex White. 
In mid-March, Harvard became one of the first universities to close its campus on short notice, announcing it was transitioning to online classes to curb the sprea… [+7100 chars]
